alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Page (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 9:33PM CDT until May 07 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY AND EASTERN PAGE COUNTIES... At 933 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northwest of Lenox to 5 miles northwest of Bedford to Braddyville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 932 PM, quarter size hail was reported in Clarinda. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Montgomery and eastern Page Counties, including the following locations... Hepburn and Blanchard. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
